ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound sliced bacon, cut in half
1 (6 ounce) can crabmeat, drained and flaked

cookingTips: Wrap bacon around a small amount of crabmeat for balanced bites
Drain crabmeat thoroughly to remove excess liquid and prevent sogginess
Bake at 400°F until bacon is crispy, about 15-20 minutes
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do I prevent the bacon from becoming greasy while keeping the crabmeat moist and flavorful?
